en:
Hey, listen, listen, @CharacterName!
Did you know?

It says here that your abilities are pretty
straightforward...

...and I mean, one seems to literally propel
you forward, haha!

*Ahem* Your Fire Kick seems to be
especially useful for damaging multiple
enemies...
because it lasts until you land!

Oooh, and your Fiery Double Jump can cover
you both to the left and right!

It's pretty clear you have what it takes to
combat multiple enemies at once, @CharacterName!
